title: Poppy skins
body: do you guys have any ideas for new poppy skins. its been awhile since she got a new skin and with the new poppy buffs i think its time for a new skin

replies.body: she will get a pajama guardian skin soon like the rest of them
Is that a leak or confirmed and is there a link for the information?
I imagine it's an educated guess. Given that they did a set of the Star Guardians as PJ Guardians, it's likely (though not guaranteed) they will do the rest.
